The Discrete Radon Transform Project¶

The command-line interface prints information about the project in console.

Usage¶

Discrete Radon Transform usage looks like:

$ discrete-radon-transform [OPTIONS]
--version¶

Display the version and exit.

--help¶

Display a short usage message and exit.

--path_to_picture¶

Path to source picture

--angle_accuracy¶

angle accuracy

--shift_accuracy¶

shift accuracy

--save_to_dir¶

Direcrory to save the result heatmap

Discrete Radon Transform
